## Managing the Internal Package Development

Learning objectives

- What's needed to make the development and uptake of the package a success?
- Who should be involved and what are their roles?
- Initial planning and prioritizing
- Support from stakeholders (for making the package)
- Hosting the package
- Quality measures and quality control
- Education/training in the use of the package
- Managing updates and major changes to the package API
- Getting internal users and encouraging contributions
- The package should have a license... which one?
- Communicating the value of the package
